itunes:title: Lava Sledding (with Pohaku Stone)
title: Lava Sledding (with Pohaku Stone)
description:
Cultural practitioner and waterman Pohaku Stone joins Ron to talk about how the ocean saved him, and how he and his family are perpetuating the death-defying Hawaiian tradition of hōlua, or lava sledding.

Support the show

content:encoded:
Cultural practitioner and waterman Pohaku Stone joins Ron to talk about how the ocean saved him, and how he and his family are perpetuating the death-defying Hawaiian tradition of hōlua, or lava sledding.
